DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect QRS®-1010 PelviCenter female patient stress urinary incontinence . Based available data magnetic stimulation , investigator hypothesize magnetic stimulation via QRS®-1010 PelviCenter reduce number amount urinary leakage upon exertion well improve patient ' quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Magnetic Stimulation Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: A total 120 female patient randomly assign two treatment group ( active arm sham arm ) 1:1 ratio . The standard QRS®-1010 PelviCenter treatment plan involve 16 session 20 minute . Each subject attend 2 session per week ( total 16 session ) .
DOC.criteria: Female age least 21 year old Demonstration stress urinary incontinence vaginal examination half full bladder ( 200 250ml ) ICIQ UI SF score ≥ 6 point Able agree carry one hour pad test Acute severe infection Urinary tract infection hematuria , active vaginal lesion infection Pelvic organ prolapse stage III IV , severe urethral sphincter weakness/defect , suspect fistula Severe cardiac arrhythmia Cardiac pacemaker implant metallic device History pelvic irradiation Pregnant , actively try conceive . Neurologic condition epilepsy , Parkinson disease , multiple sclerosis Patient treat electromagnetic stimulation Concurrent medication alphaadrenergic antagonist ( e.g . terazosin , tamsulosin , doxazosin ) , diuretic , serotonin/norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SNRIs ) medication know worsen incontinence . Post void residual volume ≥ 200ml Random blood sugar > 10 mmol/L Patient pelvic gynaecological surgery less three week Patient schedule pelvic gynaecological surgery next eight week
